thread.section_title: About.com Caribbean Travel: What's Hot Now
thread.title: Top September Caribbean Travel Deals

title: Top September Caribbean Travel Deals
text:
2. Anse Chastanet Deal Good Through Christmas 
Typical Caribbean fall travel deals expire the week before Christmas, which is what makes this one exceptional: guests at St. Lucia's Anse Chastanet can get a 5th night free on stays up to an including Christmas Day 2015. T he "St. Lucia Getaway" promotion includes free accommodations in a Hillside Deluxe or Premium room on the 5th night when four are paid. Rates start at $645 per night (through Oct. 31) and $745 (from Nov. 1 to Dec. 19) per night, per couple. For travel between Dec. 19-26, rates start at US$1,110 and include breakfast and dinner (at other times, b reakfast and dinner can be added for $90 per person, per day, and an all-inclusive meals and drinks plan can be added for US$170 per person daily. 
Prebook your meal plan and you'll get that free on your 5th night, too. 
For more information, call 800-223-1108, email ansechastanet@ansechastanet.com or visit www.ansechastanet.com .
